PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-18742001-10-180,  ,  PWGS,  , 
PrecisApproval of Regulations Amending the INTERNATIONAL LETTER-POST ITEMS REGULATIONS which will increase the basic letter rates on items mailed to the U.S. and other foreign destinations by 8.3% and 19%, respectively, effective January 14, 2002, and increase the other rates for U.S. and foreign destinations by an average of 6.8% and 11.3%, respectively.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0445 Publication Date: 2001-11-07
